article.headline: Bullish divergence persists, Nasdaq challenges record close (10,020)
article.body: U.S. stocks are higher early Friday, rising to conclude the week amid quarterly quadruple witching. Against this backdrop, the Nasdaq Composite is vying to register a record close — 10,020 is the level to beat — while the S&P 500 has ventured atop familiar gap resistance. Before detailing the U.S. markets’ wider view, the S&P 500’s hourly...
